com.inmobi.commons

Class InMobi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inmobi.commons.InMobi

  • public final class InMobi
extends Object
    Class to set initialize the sdk and set the demographic data.

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(android.app.Activity activity,
              String appId)
        Calling this API is mandatory before calling any other InMobi API.
        Parameters:
        activity -
        appId - Pass the InMobi Site Id / App Id as argument.

      • getVersion

        Get SDK Release/bundle version
        Returns:
        SDK Release/bundle version

      • setDeviceIDMask

        public static void setDeviceIDMask(int mask)
        Set the Device ID mask. Multiple ID types can be used using the "|" operator. For example, setDeviceIDMask(id1 | id2). If ID_DEVICE_NONE is used as one of the flags, then no device ID would be captured.
        Parameters:
        mask - The flag containing the integer value.
